title: Katie Price finds daughter Princess' pet hedgehog after losing it in her mucky mansion
text:

Katie Price, 41, has successfully recovered her daughter Princess' hedgehog Peggy after the prickly pet was lost inside her mucky mansion for two weeks.

The mother-of-five first shared news that the spiky woodland animal was absent when she gave fans a tour of her abode.

It was no surprise that the star managed to lose the small pet - in the first place - as her messy house is covered in piles of clothing, mounds of rubbish and clutter littered all over the place.

Now it has been revealed that Katie is able to reunite 12-year-old Princess, who she shares with ex Peter Andre, with Peggy as a source told The Sun that the mammal has been found.

The insider told the publication: "Peggy is back - Katie always knew she'd find her again."

Katie first announced she had gifted her daughter with the pet in February with a video clip on Instagram that showed Princess cradling the little creature.

Katie and her children are currently not living in her £2million Horsham house as it has been stripped bare for builders to take over to do it all up.

It comes after the busty beauty has reportedly agreed that she and her on and off again beau Kris Boyson can have sexual relations with other people.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Youtube)

The former model and personal trainer, 30, who recently reconciled after she enjoyed a fling with toyboy Charles Drury, 22, are said to have chosen to embark on an open relationship as a result of the her "insatiable appetite for sex."

A source told Heat magazine that Kris has been understanding and is "not expecting Katie to be fully committed" and knows that she wants to "have fun outside the relationship" but he has asked her to be "honest with him."

The inside added: "She’s had to be honest and tell Kris she has an insatiable appetite for sex that often gets her in trouble.”

(Image: Instagram)

"They’ve agreed to an open relationship, although it is geared towards letting Katie do what she wants."

People close to Katie and Kris are said to be "horrified" by their sexually non-monogamous relationship after hoping Kris would be a "positive influence" on the busty beauty but instead fear he is "enabling her to make the same mistakes."
description: The glamour model has found her daughter's pet hedgehog which was missing amongst the mess in her mucky mansion
